insert into PERSON_INFO
ID,
ADDRESS,
BIRTHDAY,
C_ADDRESS,
C_ENTER_TIME,
C_TEL,
C_TYPE,
COMPANY,
DEPARTMENT,
DUTY,

IDNUM,

INDUSTRY_TYPE,
MARRIED,
MEMO,
MPHONE,
NAME,
POSTCODE,
SEX,
TEL,
WORKERTYPE,
CHILDREN_COUNT,
HOUSE_TYPE,
LIVE_PERSON_COUNT,

PROFESSION,
CPAMOUNT,
ENGLISH_NAME,
ID_END_DATE,
ID_SOURCE,
ID_START_DATE,
LANGUAGE,
NATIONALITY,
WORK_YEAR,
MOTHERS_NAME,
FINANCING_COME_FROM,
INVEST_YEARS,
INVESTMENT_LORE,
P_CODE,
RECORDER_ID,
REAL_ESTATE_LICENSE_CODE,
SALES_DEPARTMENT_ID,
CREATED_DATE,
FAMILY_BACKGROUND,
MSN,
QQ,
HAS_CREDIT_CARD,
AREA_CODE,
C_CODE,
COME_FROM,
DOMICILE_PLACE,
HR_ADDRESS,
HR_POSTCODE,
OTHER_COME_FROM,
OTHER_MONTHLY_INCOME,
PAY_DAY,
TOTAL_MONTHLY_INCOME,
WAGE,
CARD_DEFICIT,
CARD_TOTAL_AMOUNT,
CREDIT_CARD_COUNT,
NUMBER_DEPENDANTED,
ADDRESS_PRIORITY,
FAMILY_EXPENSE,
OFFICIAL_RANK,
PAY_TYPE,
CARD_MAX_AMOUNT,
HAS_LOAN,
DATE_CREATED,
LAST_UPDATED,
SIGN_SALES_DEP_ID,
C_CITY,
THIRD_PARTY_ACCOUNT_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
CREATOR,
UPDATOR,

mapper.update:
update PERSON_INFO
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_ADDRESS = #{cAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ENTER_TIME = #{cEnterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_TEL = #{cTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TYPE = #{cType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ED_LEVEL = #{edLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDNUM = #{idnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDTYPE = #{idtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARRIED = #{married,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MPHONE = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKERTYPE = #{workertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN_COUNT = #{childrenCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOUSE_TYPE = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIVE_PERSON_COUNT = #{livePersonCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LIVE_WITH = #{liveWith,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RENT = #{rent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPAMOUNT = #{cpamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENGLISH_NAME = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_END_DATE = #{idEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ID_SOURCE = #{idSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_START_DATE = #{idStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LANGUAGE = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIONALITY = #{nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_YEAR = #{workYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MOTHERS_NAME = #{mothersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCING_COME_FROM = #{financingComeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVEST_YEARS = #{investYears,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTMENT_LORE = #{investmentLore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_CODE = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDER_ID = #{recorderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REAL_ESTATE_LICENSE_CODE = #{realEstateLicenseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_DEPARTMENT_ID = #{salesDepartmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FAMILY_BACKGROUND = #{familyBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSN = #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAS_CREDIT_CARD = #{hasCreditCard,jdbcType=CHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CODE = #{cCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COME_FROM = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMICILE_PLACE = #{domicilePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HR_ADDRESS = #{hrAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HR_POSTCODE = #{hrPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_COME_FROM = #{otherComeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_MONTHLY_INCOME = #{otherMonthlyIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_DAY = #{payDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_MONTHLY_INCOME = #{totalMonthlyIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WAGE = #{wage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARD_DEFICIT = #{cardDeficit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARD_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{cardTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREDIT_CARD_COUNT = #{creditCardCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUMBER_DEPENDANTED = #{numberDependanted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS_PRIORITY = #{addressPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAMILY_EXPENSE = #{familyExpense,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OFFICIAL_RANK = #{officialRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_MAX_AMOUNT = #{cardMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HAS_LOAN = #{hasLoan,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATE_CREATED = #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED = #{lastUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIGN_SALES_DEP_ID = #{signSalesDepId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_CITY = #{cCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THIRD_PARTY_ACCOUNT_ID = #{thirdPartyAccountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.sql:
SELECT
,COM_ORGANIZATION . ID ORG_ID ,COM_ORGANIZATION . NAME ORG_NAME ,COM_ORGANIZATION . ORG_CODE FROM PERSON_INFO , COM_ORGANIZATION
,PERSON_CONTACT_INFO
mapper.select: SELECT distinct p.mphone,p.name,e.name as ename,e.id, e.in_active,e.leave_office_date FROM loan_base t left join com_employee e on t.salesman_id = e.id left join person_info p on t.borrower_id = p.id where e.in_active!='t' and t.loan_state not in ('拒绝','结清','取消')

select p.id as "personId", p.name as "name", p.idtype as "idType", '0' as "idTypeCode", p.idnum as "idNum", to_char(p.birthday,'yyyymmdd') as "birthday", p.sex as "sex", case when p.sex = '男' then '1' when p.sex = '女' then '2' else '' end as "sexCode", p.mphone as "mobilePhone", p.address as "contactAddress", '' as "livingStatus", '' as "marryStatus", '' as "marryStatusCode", '' as "edLevel", '' as "edLevelCode", '' as "degree", '' as "degreeNo", '' as "postCode", '' as "areaBelong", '' as "areaBelongCode", '' as "income", p.profession as "profession", p.company as "company", p.industry_type as "industryType", '' as "industryTypeCode", p.c_type as "companyType", '' as "companyTypeCode", p.c_tel as "companyTel", p.c_address as "companyAddress", '' as "companyEntryYear" from person_info p
and p.idnum = #{idNum}
